name: WP Easy Popup
author: Team Startbit

sections.description:
WP Easy Popup Plugin is world renowned as the most beautiful and easy to create popups for different pages in the market.
We can create more popups with different-2 styles and attractive for different-2 pages.
The WP Easy Popup is completely free and totally open source, and there is literally no better way to make your website look totally stunning.

You can also customize setting for following features:

  • You can add a header or heading section on the top of plugin.
  • You can customize the Background color of header section.
  • You can set the color and the font size of text in header section as well.
  • You can add image to the Popup.
  • You can get Popup with or without image.
  • You can design the close button according to your color-combination of Popup by changing its background-color and color.
  • You can set the Popup display time.
  • You can set the time to remove the popup automatically as well.
  • You can customize Width of Popup box.
  • You can also customize Background color and Text color also.
  • You can also customize Popup display days.
  • You can also hide Popup box on mobile devices.
  • You can also hide popup box for logged-in users.

Issues with display

  • Please update to latest version. Up-to-date API’s are available.

Features

-Easy to install.
-Tons of configuration options.
-Browser support: Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera , IE7+

Translators

  • English(US) (en_Us) – Team Startbit
  • Serbian (sr_RS) – Team Startbit

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update of an existing one, you can send gettext PO and MO files to us so that We can bundle it into this plugin.

Rate Us / Feedback

Please take the time to let us and others know about your experiences by leaving a review, so that we can improve the plugin for you and other users.

Want More?

If You Want more functionality or some modifications, just drop us a line what you want and We will try to add or modify the plugin functions.

Credits

  1. Thanks to Fancybox for great help with the js file.
sections.installation:
Installation consists of following steps:

  1. Upload “wp-easy-popup” to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create many popups and add contents from backend and style them.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added new functionality for login user.
  • Add remove image button
  • Added image position

1.0.3

  • Added Tons of new features to make it more user friendly.
  • Can be made More Vibrant With all your color choices.

1.0.2

  • Resolved the issues and make compatible with GPL.

1.0.1

  • Multi languages support.
  • POT file added for translate plugin in your language.
  • You can also hide Popup box for logged-in users.
  • You can also hide Popup box in mobile devices.

1.0.0

  • Initial release
